statements: SELECT * FROM demand_forecasts;
SELECT product_id, forecast_date, forecast_quantity FROM demand_forecasts WHERE forecast_quantity > 100;
SELECT id, product_id, forecast_date FROM demand_forecasts WHERE product_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM demand_forecasts WHERE forecast_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT id, forecast_quantity FROM demand_forecasts WHERE updated_at >= '2022-05-01';
SELECT * FROM demand_forecasts WHERE forecast_quantity > 100 ORDER BY forecast_date DESC, forecast_quantity ASC LIMIT 10
SELECT product_id, COUNT(*) AS total_forecasts FROM demand_forecasts GROUP BY product_id HAVING total_forecasts > 5 ORDER BY total_forecasts DESC
SELECT id, forecast_date, forecast_quantity FROM demand_forecasts WHERE forecast_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY forecast_quantity ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT product_id, AVG(forecast_quantity) AS avg_quantity FROM demand_forecasts GROUP BY product_id HAVING avg_quantity > 50 ORDER BY product_id
SELECT * FROM demand_forecasts WHERE created_at > '2022-06-15' AND updated_at < '2022-09-01' ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT 3
SELECT * FROM demand_forecasts;
SELECT product_id, forecast_amount, forecast_date FROM demand_forecasts WHERE forecast_amount > 100;
SELECT forecast_id, forecast_date, forecast_amount FROM demand_forecasts ORDER BY forecast_date DESC;
SELECT forecast_id, forecast_amount FROM demand_forecasts WHERE product_id = 1;
SELECT log_id, log_type, log_date FROM demand_forecast_logs WHERE log_type = 'update';
SELECT * FROM demand_forecasts WHERE forecast_id = 1;
SELECT forecast_id, forecast_amount, forecast_date FROM demand_forecasts ORDER BY forecast_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM demand_forecast_logs WHERE log_type = 'update' ORDER BY log_date DESC LIMIT 10;

SELECT demand_forecasts.forecast_id, demand_forecasts.forecast_amount, demand_forecast_logs.log_date FROM demand_forecasts INNER JOIN demand_forecast_logs ON demand_forecasts.forecast_id = demand_forecast_logs.forecast_id;
SELECT forecast_id, SUM(forecast_amount) AS total_forecast_amount FROM demand_forecasts GROUP BY forecast_id HAVING total_forecast_amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM products;
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM products ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT user_name, email FROM users WHERE role = 'admin';
SELECT forecast_date, forecast_value FROM demand_forecast_data WHERE product_id = 101;
SELECT user_name, action, timestamp FROM users JOIN audit_log ON users.user_id = audit_log.user_id;
SELECT * FROM demand_forecast_audit_log;
SELECT forecast_date, forecast_value FROM demand_forecast_data WHERE product_id = 101;
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM products ORDER BY category DESC;
SELECT user_id, user_name, email, role FROM users WHERE role = 'admin';
SELECT * FROM audit_log WHERE action = 'update' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM demand_forecasts;
SELECT id, product_id, forecast_value FROM demand_forecasts WHERE id = 1;
SELECT name, description, price FROM products ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT id, username, email FROM users WHERE created_at > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM audit_logs LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM demand_forecasts WHERE forecast_value > 100;
SELECT product_id, AVG(forecast_value) AS avg_value FROM demand_forecasts GROUP BY product_id;
SELECT id, event_type, table_name, timestamp FROM audit_logs WHERE event_type = 'UPDATE' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE created_at BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT name, description, price FROM products WHERE price < 50 ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT * FROM demand_forecast_changes;
SELECT forecast_id, previous_value, new_value FROM demand_forecast_changes WHERE id = 10;
SELECT id, forecast_id, previous_value, new_value FROM demand_forecast_changes ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT product_name, category, description FROM products WHERE category = 'Electronics';
SELECT log_id, timestamp, action, user_id FROM audit_logs WHERE action = 'UPDATE' AND table_name = 'products';
SELECT * FROM demand_forecast_changes ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT forecast_id, forecast_value, date FROM forecasts WHERE forecast_value > 1000
SELECT product_name, category FROM products WHERE category = 'Electronics'
SELECT * FROM audit_logs WHERE action = 'UPDATE' OR action = 'DELETE'
SELECT username, email FROM users ORDER BY username ASC
